responsibilities: Work on projects within scrum teams of 2-4 people.
Identify opportunities for different machine learning techniques and evaluate which are best.
Assist in developing and deploying ML-based production services to clients.
Understand and follow conventions and best practices for modeling, coding, architecture, and statistics.
Hold other team members accountable for following best practices.
Apply rigorous testing of statistics, models, and code.
Contribute to the development of internal tools and data science team standards.
skills: Ability to work with colleagues from a variety of technical and non-technical backgrounds.
Experience using machine learning models and libraries.
Familiarity with NLP or computer vision techniques.
Experience using the AWS ecosystem, including Kubernetes, Kubeflow, or EKS.
Excellent verbal communication and writing skills.
qualifications: Bachelors in a relevant field: math, computer science, data science, economics.
3-5 years of professional experience developing and evaluating machine learning models.
Experience with GenAI is a bonus, but not required.
